================================================ Hàienda Initial Tender Notice
================================================

### Tender Announcement

**Note:** Please note that this tender opportunity has expired.

**Procurement ID:** WS4213421512
**Reference Number:** DOC4316939870

### Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Canada, invites proposals for the procurement of Government of Canada paper cheque forms, 2007 design, in both roll and cut sheet formats. The deliverables include:

* 2007 design Government of Canada paper cheque forms
* Roll and cut sheet formats

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-05T14:00:00
* **Contract Type:** Security Printing and Paper Documents
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity

* **Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End-User

* **Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Niall MacConaill (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:niall.macconaill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 
* **Fax:**
* **Language Preference:** French/English, priority to bicultural individuals

# Catrigs and SpeslaciationFor payment purposes, please note that this tender is part of the Government of Canada's ongoing efforts to modernize the procurement process.
